dc_title_s: Map of the states of Ohio, Indiana, Illinois and part of Michigan territory compiled from the latest authorities D.H. Vance del.; J.H. Young sc.
dc_description_s: Shows counties, roads, and water features. Shows township and range lines for surveyed part of Michigan. No. 11 in A New American atlas / A. Finley. "Longitude west from Washington". Mounted on cloth. Includes "Statistical table". 1 map on 2 sheets joined: col.; 42 x 53 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Finley, A. (Anthony),Vance, D. H.,Young, J. H. (James Hamilton)
